name: AnimatedContainer
desc: Animated version of [Container] that gradually changes its values over a period of time.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: Empty space to inscribe inside the [decoration]. The [child], if any, is placed inside this padding.

fields.name: decoration
fields.desc: The decoration to paint behind the [child].

fields.name: foregroundDecoration
fields.desc: The decoration to paint in front of the child.

fields.name: constraints
fields.desc: Additional constraints to apply to the child.

fields.name: margin
fields.desc: Empty space to surround the [decoration] and [child].

fields.name: transform
fields.desc: The transformation matrix to apply before painting the container.

fields.name: transformAlignment
fields.desc: The alignment of the origin, relative to the size of the container, if [transform] is specified.

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: The clip behavior when [AnimatedContainer.decoration] is not null.
